name: aesthetic-computer-micro
description: A portable Fedora based environment for running and hacking on aesthetic-computer.

scripts.boot: cd machine; if [ -z "$(docker ps -aq -f name=aesthetic-container)" ]; then npm run build && docker run -d -p 8888:8888 -p 8889:8889 --hostname aesthetic --env-file .env --env-file github.env --env-file netlify.env --env-file vercel.env --env-file stripe.env --volume ~/Desktop/code/aesthetic-computer:/home/me/aesthetic-computer --user me --platform linux/amd64 --name aesthetic-container -it aesthetic-micro /usr/bin/fish entry.fish; else docker start aesthetic-container; fi
scripts.reset: cd machine; docker ps -q -a --filter 'name=aesthetic-container' | xargs -r docker rm -f; docker rmi aesthetic-micro -f

author: Jeffrey Alan Scudder
